**Aerological Observations at the Iqaluit Upper Air Station**
*************************************************

**Solicitation Number:** 5000068002-01
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Reference Number:** cb-826-25312543
**Publication Date:** February 6, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 4, 2024, at 14:00:00
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Procurement Description:**
Environment and Climate Change Canada requires contracted services for aerological observations at the Iqaluit Upper Air Station, Nunavut. The successful contractor will be responsible for preparing instruments and conducting upper air soundings twice daily for 365 days per year, with the data transmission to be completed promptly on site.

**Duration of Contract:**
The contract duration is from the award date to March 31, 2026, with three (3) one-year option periods.

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity is Environment and Climate Change Canada, with its address located at 351 boul. St-Joseph, Gatineau, Québec K1A 0H3, Canada.

**GSIN Classification:**
The solicitation utilizes the following General Service Category classification: E101A - Air Quality Support Services.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The selection criteria for the tender will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Notice URL:**
The official notice URL is available at [link]. The tender documents may be accessed via [link].

**Attachments:**
The following attachments are available with this notice:
- Solicitation document
- Amendment #1

**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions about this tender, please contact Garvin Suepaul, phone: (613) 295-4823, email: garvin.suepaul@ec.gc.ca.
